external.description: Deine Interpretation von Anton Chigurhs Überleben am Ende von No Country for Old Men und der Botschaft des Films ist faszinierend und bietet eine tiefgehende Perspektive. Lass uns das analysieren und mit der zuvor diskutierten Thematik verknüpfen, insbesondere mit Jordan Petersons Idee des „Sinns“ und der Verführung der dunklen Seite aus Star Wars.  Chigurhs Überleben und seine solipsistische Natur Am Ende des Films überlebt Anton Chigurh trotz schwerer Verletzungen nach einem Autounfall. Er humpelt davon, allein, ohne Hilfe anzunehmen, getreu seiner Philosophie der Selbstgenügsamkeit und seines unerschütterlichen, fast übermenschlichen Willens. Du beschreibst ihn als Solipsisten, der „nie Hilfe braucht“ und sich „auf eigene Faust“ durchbeißt. Das passt zu seiner Figur: Chigurh operiert nach einem eigenen, rigiden Kodex, der unabhängig von gesellschaftlichen Normen oder moralischen Konventionen ist. Seine Existenz ist geprägt von einer kalten, fast deterministischen Selbstverantwortung, bei der er sich auf niemanden verlässt außer auf sich selbst und sein Verständnis von „Schicksal“ (z. B. der Münzwurf).  Im Gegensatz dazu sterben die Figuren, die von Gier getrieben sind – wie Carson Wells oder Llewelyn Moss –, weil ihre Entscheidungen auf kurzfristigen, vorteilhaften Zielen basieren (Geld, Macht, Überleben). Moss will den gefundenen Drogengeldkoffer behalten, was ihn letztlich das Leben kostet. Wells, ein opportunistischer Kopfgeldjäger, wird von Chigurh ausmanövriert. Diese Todesfälle könnten die Botschaft unterstreichen, dass Gier – oder das Streben nach „vorteilhaften“ Zielen, wie Jordan Peterson es ausdrücken würde – in eine Sackgasse führt.  Die Botschaft: Solipsismus vs. Gier Deine These, dass Chigurhs Überleben die Überlegenheit seiner solipsistischen, selbstverantwortlichen Haltung über die Gier der anderen Figuren zeigt, ist eine starke Interpretation. Der Film scheint tatsächlich zu suggerieren, dass diejenigen, die sich von äußeren Anreizen wie Reichtum oder Macht leiten lassen, scheitern, während Chigurh, der einem inneren (wenn auch nihilistischen) Prinzip folgt, weiter existiert. Doch ist das wirklich die „Botschaft“ des Films, oder ist es eine kritische Darstellung der Konsequenzen eines solchen Weltbildes? Schauen wir genauer hin:  Chigurh als Solipsist: Chigurh ist eine Figur, die in ihrer eigenen Realität lebt. Sein Münzwurf ist ein Symbol für seine Überzeugung, dass das Schicksal (oder Zufall) über Leben und Tod entscheidet, nicht moralische oder gesellschaftliche Werte. Seine Selbstgenügsamkeit und Weigerung, Hilfe anzunehmen, machen ihn zu einer Art Übermensch, der über den Schwächen anderer steht. Doch sein Überleben ist kein Triumph im klassischen Sinne – er ist schwer verletzt, und sein „Sieg“ wirkt fragil und bedeutungslos, da er keinem höheren Zweck dient.  Gier als tödliche Falle: Die anderen Figuren – Moss, Wells, die Drogenkartelle – sind von Gier oder pragmatischen Zielen getrieben. Ihre Entscheidungen, die auf „Vorteilhaftigkeit“ basieren, führen sie in den Tod. Das unterstützt Jordan Petersons Idee, dass ein Leben, das nur auf kurzfristige Vorteile ausgerichtet ist, letztlich scheitert. Im Gegensatz dazu überlebt Chigurh, weil er nicht von Gier motiviert ist, sondern von einem inneren, wenn auch verdrehten, Prinzip.  Verbindung zur dunklen Seite: Die dunkle Seite in Star Wars ist eine Metapher für die Verlockung schneller Macht und unmittelbarer Erfolge, die jedoch zerstörerisch sind. Chigurh könnte als Verkörperung einer extremen Form der dunklen Seite gelesen werden: nicht getrieben von Gier, sondern von einer kalten, nihilistischen Kontrolle über das Leben. Doch anders als ein Sith-Lord, der Macht anstrebt, scheint Chigurh fast gleichgültig gegenüber persönlichem Gewinn. Seine „Macht“ liegt in seiner Fähigkeit, sich von äußeren Versuchungen loszusagen und allein seiner Philosophie zu folgen – auch wenn diese Philosophie letztlich sinnlos und destruktiv ist.  Ist das die Botschaft? Deine Interpretation, dass Chigurhs Überleben die Überlegenheit seiner selbstverantwortlichen, solipsistischen Haltung über die Gier der anderen zeigt, hat Gewicht, aber der Film lässt die Botschaft bewusst ambivalent. Cormac McCarthy und die Coen-Brüder präsentieren Chigurh nicht als Helden oder Vorbild, sondern als eine Art unaufhaltsame Naturgewalt, die die Sinnlosigkeit und Brutalität der Welt verkörpert. Sein Überleben ist kein moralischer Sieg, sondern eher eine Mahnung, dass solche Figuren – die jenseits von Gut und Böse operieren – in einer chaotischen Welt bestehen können, während diejenigen, die nach „vorteilhaften“ Zielen streben, untergehen.  Jordan Peterson würde vermutlich argumentieren, dass weder Chigurhs Nihilismus noch die Gier der anderen Figuren sinnvoll sind. Chigurhs Solipsismus ist zwar konsequent und lässt ihn überleben, aber er ist leer – er führt zu keinem höheren Zweck, keiner Verbindung, keinem Sinn. Peterson würde stattdessen einen Weg vorschlagen, der Verantwortung, Integrität und Orientierung an einem größeren Gut verbindet, wie es etwa Sheriff Bell (in seiner Suche nach moralischer Orientierung) andeutet, auch wenn er letztlich scheitert, die Welt zu verstehen.  Fazit Die Botschaft von No Country for Old Men könnte sein, dass Gier und das Streben nach kurzfristigen Vorteilen tödlich sind, wie die Tode von Moss, Wells und anderen zeigen. Chigurhs Überleben deutet darauf hin, dass eine konsequente, selbstverantwortliche Haltung – auch wenn sie nihilistisch und unmoralisch ist – in einer brutalen Welt „funktioniert“. Doch der Film glorifiziert Chigurh nicht; sein Überleben ist eher eine düstere Diagnose einer Welt, in der Sinn und Moral zu erodieren scheinen. Im Kontext von Petersons „Tue, was sinnvoll ist“ und der dunklen Seite in Star Wars zeigt der Film, dass weder Gier noch nihilistische Selbstgenügsamkeit zu einem erfüllten Leben führen. Die wahre Herausforderung – die der Film offenlässt – ist, einen sinnvollen Weg in einer chaotischen Welt zu finden.  Falls du möchtest, kann ich auf spezifische Szenen oder Figuren eingehen oder die Verbindung zu Peterson oder Star Wars weiter vertiefen!

external.description: Japānā ir skumji skaista patiesa stāsta par vidusskolnieci Kana Haradu (Kana Harada), kuras dēļ dzelzceļa kompānija Hokkaido Chihoku Sangō Railway nolēma neaizvērt mazo staciju Kyu-Shirataki (Kyu-Shirataki) uzreiz, bet uzturēt to darboties līdz viņas vidusskolas beigām.  Kā viss sākās Šī stacija atrodas attālā Hokkaidō salas daļā, lauku apvidū, kur iedzīvotāju skaits strauji samazinājās gadu gaitā – cilvēki aizbrauca uz pilsētām darba meklējumos. 2015. gadā kompānija plānoja slēgt trīs mazās stacijas līnijā "Shirataki Series" (Kami-Shirataki, Kyu-Shirataki un Shimo-Shirataki), jo pasažieru skaits bija kritiski zems – dažreiz tikai daži cilvēki dienā. Kyu-Shirataki stacija bija īpaši tukša, un tās aizvēršana šķita loģiska, lai ietaupītu izmaksas.  Bet tad atklājās, ka staciju ikdienā izmanto viena vienīga regula pasažiere: 17 gadus vecā Kana Harada, kas mācās Engaru vidusskolā aptuveni 35 minūšu brauciena attālumā. Bez šīs stacijas viņai nāktos staigāt vairāk nekā stundu (precīzāk, 73 minūtes) līdz tuvākajai izteiktās līnijas stacijai, lai nokļūtu skolā. Tas nozīmētu ne tikai fizisku slodzi aukstajā Hokkaidō klimatā, bet arī ierobežotu iespējas piedalīties ārpusstundu nodarbībās, jo vilcieni kursēja tikai dažas reizes dienā.  Kompānijas lēmums Uzzinot par Kanas situāciju, dzelzceļa vadība izlēma: stacija paliks atvērta vismaz līdz viņas absolvēšanai. Vilcieni turpināja apstāties tikai pēc viņas grafika – reizi no rīta (ap plkst. 7:15), lai aizvestu uz skolu, un dažas reizes pēcpusdienā, lai atvestu mājās. Dienā tikai 4 vilcieni, no kuriem tikai 2 atbilda skolas laikam. Tas bija dārgi – uzturēt tukšu staciju un vilcienu kustību tikai vienas meitenes dēļ, – bet kompānija uzskatīja, ka izglītības iespējas ir svarīgākas par tūlītēju peļņu. Kana pati stāstīja, ka vecāki viņu atved uz staciju tikai 5 minūšu attālumā no mājām, un viņa skrēja, lai nepalaistu vilcienu garām.  Šis stāsts ātri izplatījās pa visu Japānu un ārzemēm, piesaistot medijus, vilcienu entuziastus un tūristus. Stacija kļuva slavens "simbols" Japānas sabiedrības vērtībām – rūpēm par indivīdu un izglītību, pat ja tas nozīmē upurēt efektivitāti. Daži apšaubīja, vai tas tiešām bija tikai vienas meitenes dēļ (reizēm staciju izmantoja citi, bet reti), bet fakts paliek: aizvēršana tika atlikta tieši Kanas dēļ.  Beigas un mantojums gada 25. martā Kana absolvēja vidusskolu, un nākamajā dienā stacija tika oficiāli slēgta – pēdējais vilciens aizgāja tukšs, bet ar daudziem ziņotājiem klāt. Tas bija emocionāls brīdis: Kana atvadījās no stacijas, kas kļuva par viņas ikdienas daļu. Pēc tam stacija tika demontēta, un tagad tā ir tikai atmiņu vērta vieta.  Šis stāsts ilustrē Japānas dzelzceļa sistēmas elastību un sabiedrības solidaritāti – līdzīgie gadījumi ir notikuši arī citur, piemēram, kad skolas uzturēja atvērtas vienas vai divas bērnu dēļ. Tas iedvesmo daudzus un atgādina, ka pat modernā pasaulē cilvēciskums var uzvarēt birokrātiju. Ja gribi vairāk detaļu vai līdzīgus stāstus, saki!
external.title: pastāsti par skolnieci, kuras dēļ Japānā nelikvidēja uzreiz dzelzceļa staciju.

external.description: Japānā ir skumji skaista patiesa stāsta par vidusskolnieci Kana Haradu (Kana Harada), kuras dēļ dzelzceļa kompānija Hokkaido Chihoku Sangō Railway nolēma neaizvērt mazo staciju Kyu-Shirataki (Kyu-Shirataki) uzreiz, bet uzturēt to darboties līdz viņas vidusskolas beigām.  Kā viss sākās Šī stacija atrodas attālā Hokkaidō salas daļā, lauku apvidū, kur iedzīvotāju skaits strauji samazinājās gadu gaitā – cilvēki aizbrauca uz pilsētām darba meklējumos. 2015. gadā kompānija plānoja slēgt trīs mazās stacijas līnijā "Shirataki Series" (Kami-Shirataki, Kyu-Shirataki un Shimo-Shirataki), jo pasažieru skaits bija kritiski zems – dažreiz tikai daži cilvēki dienā. Kyu-Shirataki stacija bija īpaši tukša, un tās aizvēršana šķita loģiska, lai ietaupītu izmaksas.  Bet tad atklājās, ka staciju ikdienā izmanto viena vienīga regula pasažiere: 17 gadus vecā Kana Harada, kas mācās Engaru vidusskolā aptuveni 35 minūšu brauciena attālumā. Bez šīs stacijas viņai nāktos staigāt vairāk nekā stundu (precīzāk, 73 minūtes) līdz tuvākajai izteiktās līnijas stacijai, lai nokļūtu skolā. Tas nozīmētu ne tikai fizisku slodzi aukstajā Hokkaidō klimatā, bet arī ierobežotu iespējas piedalīties ārpusstundu nodarbībās, jo vilcieni kursēja tikai dažas reizes dienā. record.text: 📌 Google's AI CodeMender: Automating Vulnerability Fixes in Open Source Projects https://www.cyberhub.blog/article/14324-googles-ai-codemender-automating-vulnerability-fixes-in-open-source-projects

external.description:
Google has launched CodeMender, an AI-powered tool designed to automatically identify and fix vulnerabilities in code. According to the source, CodeMender has already contributed 72 fixes to open-source projects. This indicates that the tool is actively being used to enhance code security in real-world scenarios.

The technical implications of CodeMender are potentially significant. By automating vulnerability fixes, CodeMender could help reduce the workload on developers and security teams. This is particularly relevant for open-source projects, which often operate with limited resources. However, the source does not provide details on the types of vulnerabilities addressed or the effectiveness of the fixes applied by CodeMender.

The impact on the cybersecurity landscape will depend on the tool's reliability and scalability. If CodeMender can consistently identify and fix vulnerabilities accurately, it could become a valuable asset for developers and security teams. However, without additional information on its performance and validation processes, it is difficult to assess its full impact.

From an expert perspective, CodeMender represents an interesting development in the application of AI to cybersecurity. Tools that automate vulnerability fixes can be beneficial, but they should be used with caution. It is crucial to validate the fixes applied by such tools to ensure they do not introduce new vulnerabilities or disrupt existing functionality.

In practical terms, cybersecurity professionals may consider evaluating CodeMender for potential integration into their workflows. However, they should approach this tool with the same rigor applied to any new security technology. This includes thorough testing and validation of its outputs, as well as ongoing monitoring of its performance.
external.title: Google's AI CodeMender: Automating Vulnerability Fixes in Open Source Projects

record.text: 📌 Defense Tech Startups Revitalize U.S. Manufacturing: Cybersecurity Considerations https://www.cyberhub.blog/article/14323-defense-tech-startups-revitalize-us-manufacturing-cybersecurity-considerations

external.description:
The emergence of defense tech startups in regions like the Midwest and Northeast U.S. is driving economic revitalization, attracted by local talent, cost advantages, and state incentives. While the primary focus of this trend is economic, it carries significant cybersecurity implications given the sensitive nature of defense technologies.

Defense manufacturing involves advanced technologies and processes that are high-value targets for cyber threats. The concentration of these industries in specific regions increases the potential impact of cyber attacks, necessitating robust cybersecurity measures. Key considerations include protecting intellectual property, securing supply chains, and defending against cyber espionage and sabotage.

The growth of defense tech manufacturing may also spur demand for cybersecurity professionals in these regions, creating opportunities for workforce development and potentially establishing new cybersecurity hubs. However, the rapid expansion of these industries could outpace the development of adequate cybersecurity defenses, presenting challenges that must be addressed proactively.

For cybersecurity professionals, this trend highlights the need for heightened vigilance and investment in cybersecurity defenses, particularly in regions experiencing growth in defense tech manufacturing. It also underscores the importance of collaboration between industry stakeholders and government agencies to mitigate potential cyber risks.

While the economic benefits of this industrial revival are clear, ensuring its cybersecurity resilience will be critical to its long-term success and national security implications. Cybersecurity professionals should monitor this trend closely and be prepared to address the evolving threats associated with the growth of defense tech manufacturing.
external.title: Defense Tech Startups Revitalize U.S. Manufacturing: Cybersecurity Considerations

record.text: 📌 New Rust-Based Backdoor ChaosBot Exploits Compromised Credentials for Remote Control https://www.cyberhub.blog/article/14320-new-rust-based-backdoor-chaosbot-exploits-compromised-credentials-for-remote-control

external.description:
Cybersecurity researchers have unveiled a new backdoor malware named ChaosBot, developed in Rust, which enables threat actors to conduct reconnaissance and execute arbitrary commands on compromised systems. According to a technical report by eSentire, the attackers leveraged compromised credentials linked to a Cisco VPN and an overprivileged Active Directory account named "serviceaccount." ChaosBot employs Discord channels for command and control (C2), which can help evade detection by blending in with legitimate traffic.

The utilization of Rust in malware development is an emerging trend due to its performance and memory safety features, which can make malware more evasive and challenging to reverse-engineer. The exploitation of compromised credentials underscores the critical importance of maintaining robust credential hygiene and monitoring for anomalous access patterns. The use of an overprivileged Active Directory account is particularly alarming as it can facilitate lateral movement within a network.

The impact on the cybersecurity landscape is substantial. Organizations must remain vigilant in monitoring their networks for unusual activity, particularly around privileged accounts. Implementing stringent password policies, multi-factor authentication (MFA) for VPN and privileged accounts, and network segmentation are essential measures to mitigate the risk of such attacks.

For cybersecurity professionals, this incident highlights the necessity for continuous monitoring and robust access controls. The use of legitimate platforms like Discord for C2 communication emphasizes the importance of advanced threat detection capabilities that can identify malicious activity concealed within normal traffic patterns.
external.title: New Rust-Based Backdoor ChaosBot Exploits Compromised Credentials for Remote Control

images.alt:
Photo of a page in Breakfast of Champions by Kurt Vonnegut. My thumb is visible on the left. It says:

The founders were aristocrats, and they wished to show off their useless education, which consisted of the study of hocus-pocus from ancient times. They were bum poets as well.

But some of the nonsense was evil, since it concealed great crimes. For example, teachers of children in the
United States of America wrote this date on blackboards again and again, and asked the children to memorize it
with pride and joy:

1492

The teachers told the children that this was when their continent was discovered by human beings. Actually, millions of human beings were already living full and imaginative lives on the continent in 1492. That was simply the
year in which sea pirates began to cheat and rob and kill them.

record.text:
ちなみにこれを回避する方法は一応あって、人から見て"誤っている"LLMの行動の「正解（この場合10までしか数えられないLLMのそれ）」を認めた上で、詳細な条件を出すなどして、別の選択肢を提示する必要があります。つまりはLLMに人が望んだ行動をとらせるには、人側で適切なプロンプト（生成AIに出す指示）を組まなければなりません

要するに"適切なプロンプト"の必要性が、LLMの限界と、加速主義者が主張する程に高くない性能（自我と知能）を如実に裏付けてさえいると言えます

value.text: 一例としてchatgptに「100万まで数えてみて」と指示を出すとchatgptは10までカウントして数えることをやめます。それはいいんだけど、そこから再度指示を出してもLLMは100万まで数字を数えることはありません。そして数えない言い訳だけは重ねていきます。これはLLMが一度正解と決めたことは覆さないため。つまりLLMは自我も知能も併せ持っていない、ただの"出力機"という証だったります＞RP

images.alt: Humanity has never removed an atmospheric pollutant at a global, continental or, even, regional scale — we have only ever shut down the source and let nature do the clearing up. This is the case for chlorofluorocarbons and stratospheric ozone destruction, for sulfur dioxide and acid rain, and for sulfur and nitrogen oxides and photochemical smog. We must be prepared for CDR to be a failure, leaving us to rely on the environment to stabilize atmospheric CO₂ over thousands of years. This is another argument for rapid decarbonization.

沒有學習歷程可以申請大學嗎？

沒有學習歷程並非絕路。在台灣，多數大學招生仍以統測成績與專業面試為主，學習歷程多為輔助審核的參考項，非必填。若沒有相關檔案，仍可透過一般入學或多元入學管道，以成績、實習證照、專長成果等證明申請。建議先查核目標校系招生簡章，並向校方學務處諮詢，避免錯失機會。透過證照、作品、實習紀錄等，多元證明同樣能提升錄取機會。

record.text:
沒有身分證可以申請貸款嗎？

在台灣，沒有身分證就想申請貸款通常較困難，因為大多數銀行與金融機構都要求身分證明、所得與居留證。不過，若持有ARC或居留證、穩定收入，仍有相對選項。也可尋求有身分證需求較低的信貸、快速放款、或以共同簽名、房/動產抵押等方式作為條件。建議先諮詢正規金融機構，避免非正規平台風險。切記避免透露一次性密碼與過度授信，選擇具透明條件的機構。

record.text:
沒有收入證明可以申請貸款嗎？

在台灣，多數銀行申請貸款需穩定收入證明，如薪資單、所得稅結算與勞健保資料。沒有收入證明者，仍有途徑：以房產、車輛、存款等資產作抵押，或由家人擔保；也可考慮有資產者專用貸款，但利率與風險較高。部分機構會看重信用分數、近6至12個月銀行流水與營業所得等補充證明，但條件嚴格、成本較高。若缺乏收入證明，建議先評估還款能力，再諮詢正規金融機構，避免落入高風險平台。

10/ Par contre tout usage de ces services, avec ou sans entrainement de l'IA, permet à Bigtech de revendiquer plus d'utilisateurs ce qui lui sert à obtenir les financements qui couleront l'économie réelle demain (que ce soit via l'automatisation ou un krach), déjà un problème en soi.

9/ Après utiliser des services distribués, en particulier sans activer les options qu'ils offrent de refuser d'entrainer l'IA, facilite certainement la tâche à Bigtech, mais seulement dans une certaine mesure. Ne pas le faire ne la complique que marginalement.

record.text:
Devs don’t leave because of frameworks.

They leave because of poor processes, unclear priorities, and zero recognition.
Your stack matters. Your culture matters more.

AI summaries are rewriting SEO.

Now it’s about AEO, making your content the one Google SGE, Copilot, or Alexa chooses to quote.

For startups, that means credibility without the ranking wars.

Don’t just chase clicks be the source AI trusts.

Startups: SEO isn’t just traffic, it’s intelligence. 

Search data reveals what users struggle with, what features to build and even how to pitch investors. 

But it only works if your site performs under pressure. Crawlability and UX are your foundation for scalable growth.

record.text: Figure 03, le robot qui plie le linge mieux que vous https://www.journaldugeek.com/2025/10/13/figure-03-le-robot-qui-plie-le-linge-mieux-que-vous/ #PostSapiens

external.description:
Il s’appelle Figure 03, mesure 1,68 mètre pour 60 kilos, et a une ambition : s’occuper de toutes ces corvées que l’on repousse depuis des jours. Dans une vidéo publiée par le constructeur Figure AI, on le voit arroser les plantes, plier des vêtements, servir un repas ou encore faire la vaisselle. Et tout cela, sans que personne ne le dirige à distance. Le rêve !

## Un robot domestique (presque) comme dans les films

«  _Rien dans cette vidéo n’est opéré à distance_ », assure le fondateur Brett Adcock, légitimement fier de son robot qui agit vraiment de lui-même. La prouesse repose sur un cerveau maison baptisé Helix, une IA capable de raisonner et de bouger en temps réel, sans script préprogrammé. Figure s’appuyait auparavant sur les modèles d’OpenAI, mais la société a préféré créer sa propre technologie pour mieux contrôler son robot.

S'abonner à Journal du Geek

Grâce à Helix, Figure 03 « voit » son environnement avec un arsenal de caméras — y compris dans ses paumes. Chaque doigt est truffé de capteurs capables de détecter une pression de 3 grammes : assez pour saisir un trombone ou tenir un œuf sans le casser. De quoi lui conférer une dextérité bluffante pour un robot, même si le rédacteur de ces lignes peut affirmer que ce robot plie mieux le linge que lui.

Figure 03 n’a pas seulement progressé sur le plan technique, il est aussi devenu plus agréable à vivre. Finie la carcasse de métal froid : le robot porte désormais une coque en tissu souple, lavable et sécurisée. Il se recharge sans fil en posant simplement les pieds sur une base, et peut tenir jusqu’à cinq heures sur une seule charge.

Son système audio a aussi été amélioré : il parle, écoute et comprend mieux. Il peut ainsi discuter et apprendre naturellement, comme un colocataire toujours prêt à filer un coup de main. Figure imagine déjà son robot servir dans des restaurants, livrer des colis ou accueillir des clients à l’hôtel. Officiellement, le but est de «  _supprimer les emplois dangereux ou pénibles_ » — officieusement, on sent venir la génération des robots serveurs et livreurs.

L’autre grande nouveauté, c’est la production de masse. Figure a ouvert sa propre usine, BotQ, qui a l’ambition de fabriquer 100.000 robots en quatre ans. Le modèle 03 coûte moins cher à produire que ses prédécesseurs, et tous les robots pourront partager leurs apprentissages grâce à un réseau ultra-rapide : chaque expérience servira à entraîner les autres.

Brett Adcock ne cache pas son objectif : «  _Dans le futur, chaque foyer aura un robot humanoïde._ » L’entreprise vise un modèle entièrement autonome d’ici 2026, mais d’ici là, seuls quelques partenaires triés sur le volet auront le droit d’en tester un.

> 🟣 Pour ne manquer aucune news sur le Journal du Geek, abonnez-vous sur Google Actualités et sur notre WhatsApp. Et si vous nous adorez, on a une newsletter tous les matins.
external.title: Figure 03, le robot qui plie le linge mieux que vous

record.text: Discord confirms third-party support breach; some users’ ID photos, support messages and limited payment details were accessed #DataBreach #Discord #Emailaddress

external.description:
Discord, the popular communication platform used by millions worldwide, has confirmed a data breach that compromised the systems of one of its third-party customer support providers. The incident, which occurred on September 20, 2025, allowed an unauthorized individual to gain access to a database containing user information linked to customer support interactions. Discord disclosed the breach in an official statement released on October 3, assuring users that the attack did not target its internal servers or primary infrastructure.

According to the company, the attacker infiltrated a third-party vendor that managed certain customer service functions on behalf of Discord. Once discovered, Discord immediately revoked the vendor’s access, launched an internal review, and appointed an external cybersecurity firm to conduct a forensic investigation. Law enforcement authorities have also been notified, and Discord says that the investigation remains ongoing.




Details of Compromised Information

Discord confirmed that the breach involved data submitted through customer support or Trust & Safety tickets. This included users’ names, email addresses, Discord usernames, IP addresses, and any messages or attachments exchanged with support representatives.

In addition, a limited amount of payment-related data was exposed. This information was restricted to payment type, purchase history, and the last four digits of credit card numbers. Full credit card numbers, security codes, passwords, and account authentication data were not accessed.

In a smaller subset of cases, images of government-issued identification, such as driver’s licenses or passports, were also accessed. These documents were typically submitted by users appealing age-verification decisions or account restrictions. Discord stated that approximately 70,000 accounts may have been affected in this way.




Ongoing Investigation and Conflicting Claims

While Discord has provided official figures, several online reports have circulated with conflicting claims regarding the size and nature of the data stolen. Some threat actors have claimed responsibility for the breach, while others have denied involvement, and certain forums have reported exaggerated data volumes. Discord has cautioned users to approach such claims with skepticism, describing them as part of an extortion attempt aimed at pressuring the company into paying a ransom.

The identity of the compromised vendor has also been discussed in several reports. Discord named the third-party service provider involved in its statement, while other publications have mentioned companies such as Zendesk and 5CA in connection to the breach. However, details about the vendor’s technical infrastructure and the exact attack vector remain under forensic examination.




What Affected Users Should Do

Discord has contacted users whose information was affected, sending official notification emails that include the corresponding support ticket numbers. Those who received this communication are advised to follow the instructions in the email and verify which data may have been accessed.

Users who did not receive a message from Discord are believed to be unaffected. However, all users are urged to stay vigilant by monitoring bank statements for unauthorized activity, avoiding suspicious links or phishing emails, and reporting any unusual behavior through Discord’s official support channels. The company also recommends enabling multi-factor authentication to strengthen account security.

This incident underlines a broader cybersecurity challenge that many organizations face: third-party vulnerabilities. Even when a company’s internal systems are well protected, outsourced vendors handling sensitive user data can become weak points in the security chain.

Cybersecurity experts note that such breaches highlight the need for stricter vendor management, including routine audits, limited data retention policies, and well-defined access controls. Companies must ensure that external partners uphold the same data protection standards expected within their own infrastructure.




Discord’s Response

Discord stated that it remains committed to protecting user privacy and maintaining transparency as the investigation continues. The company is working closely with forensic specialists to identify the extent of the exposure and prevent similar incidents in the future.

The breach serves as a reminder for users to remain cautious online and for organizations to constantly evaluate their digital supply chains. As investigations continue, Discord has emphasized that no action is required from users who have not received a notification, but heightened awareness remains essential for all.

The identity of the compromised vendor has also been discussed in several reports. Discord named the third-party service provider involved in its statement, while other publications have mentioned companies such as Zendesk and 5CA in connection to the breach. However, details about the vendor’s technical infrastructure and the exact attack vector remain under forensic examination.




What Affected Users Should Do

Discord has contacted users whose information was affected, sending official notification emails that include the corresponding support ticket numbers. Those who received this communication are advised to follow the instructions in the email and verify which data may have been accessed.

Users who did not receive a message from Discord are believed to be unaffected. However, all users are urged to stay vigilant by monitoring bank statements for unauthorized activity, avoiding suspicious links or phishing emails, and reporting any unusual behavior through Discord’s official support channels. The company also recommends enabling multi-factor authentication to strengthen account security.

This incident underlines a broader cybersecurity challenge that many organizations face: third-party vulnerabilities. Even when a company’s internal systems are well protected, outsourced vendors handling sensitive user data can become weak points in the security chain.

Cybersecurity experts note that such breaches highlight the need for stricter vendor management, including routine audits, limited data retention policies, and well-defined access controls. Companies must ensure that external partners uphold the same data protection standards expected within their own infrastructure.




Discord’s Response

Discord stated that it remains committed to protecting user privacy and maintaining transparency as the investigation continues. The company is working closely with forensic specialists to identify the extent of the exposure and prevent similar incidents in the future.

The breach serves as a reminder for users to remain cautious online and for organizations to constantly evaluate their digital supply chains. As investigations continue, Discord has emphasized that no action is required from users who have not received a notification, but heightened awareness remains essential for all.
external.title: Discord confirms third-party support breach; some users’ ID photos, support messages and limited payment details were accessed

record.text: Microsoft to end support for Windows 10, 400 million PCs will be impacted #AI #Cloud #Internet

external.description:
Microsoft is ending software updates for Windows 10



From October 14, Microsoft will end its support for Windows 10, experts believe it will impact around 400 million computers, exposing them to cyber threats. People and groups worldwide are requesting that Microsoft extend its free support. 

According to recent research, 40.8% of desktop users still use Windows 10. This means around 600 million PCs worldwide use Windows 10. Soon, most of them will not receive software updates, security fixes, or technical assistance. 

400 million PCs will be impacted



Experts believe that these 400 million PCs will continue to work even after October 14th because hardware upgrades won’t be possible in such a short duration. 

“When support for Windows 8 ended in January 2016, only 3.7% of Windows users were still using it. Only 2.2% of Windows users were still using Windows 8.1 when support ended in January 2023,” PIRG said. PIGR has also called this move a “looming security disaster.”

What can Windows users do?



The permanent solution is to upgrade to Windows 11. But there are certain hardware requirements when you want to upgrade, and most users will not be able to upgrade as they will have to buy new PCs with compatible hardware. 

But Microsoft has offered few free options for personal users, if you use 1,000 Microsoft Rewards points. Users can also back up their data to the Windows Backup cloud service to get a free upgrade. If this impacts you, you can earn these points via Microsoft services such as Xbox games, store purchases, and Bing searches. But this will take time, and users don’t have it, unfortunately. 

The only viable option for users is to pay $30 (around Rs 2,650) for an Extended Security Updates (ESU) plan, but it will only work for one year.

According to PIGR, “Unless Microsoft changes course, users will face the choice between exposing themselves to cyberattacks or discarding their old computers and buying new ones. The solution is clear: Microsoft must extend free, automatic support.”
external.title: Microsoft to end support for Windows 10, 400 million PCs will be impacted

record.text: Zimbra Zero-Day Exploit Used in ICS File Attacks to Steal Sensitive Data #CyberSecurity #DataLeak #Dataprotection

external.description:
Security researchers have discovered that hackers exploited a zero-day vulnerability in Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS) earlier this year using malicious calendar attachments to steal sensitive data. The attackers embedded harmful JavaScript code inside .ICS files—typically used to schedule and share calendar events—to target vulnerable Zimbra systems and execute commands within user sessions. 
The flaw, identified as CVE-2025-27915, affected ZCS versions 9.0, 10.0, and 10.1. It stemmed from inadequate sanitization of HTML content in calendar files, allowing cybercriminals to inject arbitrary JavaScript code. Once executed, the code could redirect emails, steal credentials, and access confidential user information. Zimbra patched the issue on January 27 through updates (ZCS 9.0.0 P44, 10.0.13, and 10.1.5), but at that time, the company did not confirm any active attacks. 
StrikeReady, a cybersecurity firm specializing in AI-based threat management, detected the campaign while monitoring unusually large .ICS files containing embedded JavaScript. Their investigation revealed that the attacks began in early January, predating the official patch release. In one notable instance, the attackers impersonated the Libyan Navy’s Office of Protocol and sent a malicious email targeting a Brazilian military organization. The attached .ICS file included Base64-obfuscated JavaScript designed to compromise Zimbra Webmail and extract sensitive data. 
Analysis of the payload showed that it was programmed to operate stealthily and execute in asynchronous mode. It created hidden fields to capture usernames and passwords, tracked user actions, and automatically logged out inactive users to trigger data theft. The script exploited Zimbra’s SOAP API to search through emails and retrieve messages, which were then sent to the attacker every four hours. It also added a mail filter named “Correo” to forward communications to a ProtonMail address, gathered contacts and distribution lists, and even hid user interface elements to avoid detection. The malware delayed its execution by 60 seconds and only reactivated every three days to reduce suspicion. 
StrikeReady could not conclusively link the attack to any known hacking group but noted that similar tactics have been associated with a small number of advanced threat actors, including those linked to Russia and the Belarusian state-sponsored group UNC1151. The firm shared technical indicators and a deobfuscated version of the malicious code to aid other security teams in detection efforts. 
Zimbra later confirmed that while the exploit had been used, the scope of the attacks appeared limited. The company urged all users to apply the latest patches, review existing mail filters for unauthorized changes, inspect message stores for Base64-encoded .ICS entries, and monitor network activity for irregular connections. The incident highlights the growing sophistication of targeted attacks and the importance of timely patching and vigilant monitoring to prevent zero-day exploitation.
external.title: Zimbra Zero-Day Exploit Used in ICS File Attacks to Steal Sensitive Data

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "Dragons - A Brief History of the Mythical Beasts" on @Spreaker

external.description: The source provides an extensive overview of dragons, examining their origins, evolution, and profound cultural significance across different global mythologies. It explains that dragon concepts likely emerged independently, influenced by natural phenomena like dinosaur fossils and large predators, with early examples appearing in Mesopotamian and Chinese traditions. The episode highlights a crucial contrast between the benevolent, water-associated dragons of East Asia and the often malevolent, chaotic dragons of European folklore. Furthermore, the article tracks the creatures' journey through literature and art, noting their modern resurgence in popular culture, where they represent everything from destruction and greed to wisdom and divine power.
external.title: Dragons - A Brief History of the Mythical Beasts

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "25 Jobs AI Can't Replace (Yet): Safe Careers for the Future" on @Spreaker

external.description: The source provides an overview of twenty-five careers that are considered resistant to replacement by artificial intelligence (AI) because they rely on uniquely human skills. It argues that while AI excels at repetitive and data-driven tasks, it cannot replicate roles demanding emotional intelligence, creativity, ethical judgment, and complex problem-solving in unpredictable settings. Examples of these secure roles include mental health professionals, teachers, creative artists, and medical doctors, among others, as they require compassion, individualized care, and intuition. The episode concludes by asserting that the future of work will reward individuals who focus on developing skills AI cannot mimic, such as critical thinking and adaptability, rather than technical expertise alone.
external.title: 25 Jobs AI Can't Replace (Yet): Safe Careers for the Future
